articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Yong Sok 
   Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Pak Yong Sok, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee, expressing deep condolences over his death on Sunday.
